author: Shaurya Malwa, CD Analytics
title: Bitcoin Cash Stages Surprise Run to Near $500 as Volumes Spike 500%
description: Risk assets have responded unevenly, but Bitcoin Cash appears to benefit from capital rotation into mid-cap majors.
content:
